sentences.en: After lying on the street for two hours the souse sobered up and walked home.
sentences.cn: 在街上躺了两个小时后,酒鬼醒了过来走回家去.

sentences.en: An immediate cold water souse may remove the black spot from your shirt.
sentences.cn: 立即放在凉水里浸泡可能会去掉衬衫上的黑点.

sentences.en: I like the pickles you preserved. What did you put in the souse?

sentences.en: She likes to souse everything she eats in tomato ketchup.

sentences.en: The boy went souse into the water.

sentences.en: When it is warm enough, the children souse into the swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 当天气够暖和时, 孩子们就投入到游泳池中.

words.tran_cn: 把…投入水（或其他液体）中；腌渍（souse的过去式）

trans.tran_cn: 将（某人或某物）投入或浸入水中，将水泼在…上，腌制（鱼等）
